casebody.data:
March 9, 1970

No. -.

Upjohn Co. v. Finch, Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare, et al. Stanley L. Temko and Herbert Dym for applicant. Solicitor General Griswold in opposition. C. Joseph Stetler for Pharmaceutical Manufacturers Assn, as amicus curiae in support of the application.

C. A. 6th Cir. Application for stay, presented to Mr. Justice Stewart, and by him referred to the Court, denied.

Mr. Justice Stewart took no part in the consideration or decision of this application.
